meanings.definition: To adapt for a new use or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys repurposing old jars into colorful candle holders.
meanings.sent2: The artist is repurposing old newspapers to create unique artwork.
meanings.sent3: The children had fun repurposing cardboard boxes into a makeshift fort.
meanings.sent4: Repurposing the old barn as a cozy reading nook added charm to the property.
meanings.sent5: By repurposing the broken chair, he turned it into a functional plant stand.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a new purpose or use to something.
meanings.sent1: Repurposing of old furniture is a popular trend in home decor.
meanings.sent2: The repurposing of abandoned buildings can revitalize a neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The repurposing of the old costume made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity shone through in the repurposing of everyday items.
meanings.sent5: The repurposing of the empty bottles into vases added a touch of elegance to the room.
